roleset.name: raise the price or sell to a higher bidder after an oral sale
roleset.note: Added by Julia based on BOLT. No VNcls.

example.name: args 1, 2
example.text: -LRB- Excuse me while I do a little - this is a building [0]-2 we-1 nearly bought through normal channels 5 years ago , got gazumped *-1 on *T*-2 and never thought we 'd ever get another crack at it ! -RRB-
